title: Kagi Reaches 50k Users

title: Bruteforcing the phone number of any Google user
author: brutecat

title: Apple introduces a universal design across platforms

aiHeadline: Apple finally decides that maybe having the same design across all platforms isn't such a bad idea, shocking everyone who thought they were already geniuses.
